sqlQuery.name: ByIdList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, ($$source_ids$$) ds WHERE lower(eas.source_id) = lower(ds.full_id) OR lower(eas.secondary_identifier) = lower(ds.full_id) UNION SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, ($$source_ids$$) ds WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Seqs' AND (lower(ref.primary_identifier) = lower(ds.full_id) OR lower(ref.secondary_identifier) = lower(ds.full_id))

sqlQuery.name: ByAccession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT full_id FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes WHERE source_id LIKE replace($$accession$$, '*', '%') OR full_id LIKE replace($$accession$$, '*', '%') OR group_name LIKE replace($$accession$$, '*', '%') UNION SELECT sa.full_id FROM Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name IN ('OrthoMCL Old Groups', 'OrthoMCL Old Sequences') AND (ref.primary_identifier LIKE replace($$accession$$, '*', '%') OR ref.secondary_identifier LIKE replace($$accession$$, '*', '%'))

sqlQuery.name: ByGroupIdList
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.full_id FROM ($$group_names$$) ds, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE sa.group_name = ds.group_name UNION SELECT sa.full_id FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, ($$group_names$$) ds, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE sa.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups' AND ref.primary_identifier = ds.group_name

sqlQuery.name: ByKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id FROM dots.AaSequenceImp asi, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas WHERE asi.subclass_view = 'ExternalAASequence' AND CATSEARCH(asi.description, $$keyword$$, '') > 0 AND asi.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id

sqlQuery.name: ByPfamIdOrKeyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct full_id FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment WHERE (accession LIKE UPPER(REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%')) OR symbol LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%') OR description LIKE REPLACE($$pfam_id_type_ahead$$,'*','%'))

sqlQuery.name: ByTaxonomy
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND (ot.three_letter_abbrev LIKE lower(replace($$taxon_type_ahead$$, '*', '%')) OR lower(ot.name) LIKE lower(replace($$taxon_type_ahead$$, '*', '%')))

sqlQuery.name: ByEcNumber
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct eas.secondary_identifier as full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id AND ec.ec_number LIKE REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE($$ec_number_type_ahead$$,' ',''),'-', '%'),'*','%'),'any','%')

sqlQuery.name: ByEcAssignment
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct eas.secondary_identifier as full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id

sqlQuery.name: FromGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.full_id, max(ga.wdk_weight) AS wdk_weight FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa, ($$group_answer$$) ga WHERE sa.group_name = ga.group_name GROUP BY sa.full_id

sqlQuery.name: AllSequences
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas
